message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 40%, I'll take the rest!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much more!
You can have 30%, I'll take the majority!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you 15%, it's a lowball, but it's a start!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up yet!
I'll give you 10%, it's my final offer, take it or leave it!
